item.title: FLIGHT CREW SEATS MANUAL ADJUSTMENT SYSTEM – VERTICAL ADJUSTMENT

numlitem.para: Seat is acceptable to the affected crewmember, and
Repairs are made within two flight days.

placard.para: Placard below Captains PFD on P-1-1 panel: " ____SEAT VERTCAL ADJ INOP". Enter Item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify affected seat locks in a vertical position.
